<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:17:38.744Z" channel="1468567295122214993">
<@&1468471309922078814> hi there
</message>
Hello! How can I help you today? Let me know if you have any tasks you'd like me to perform, such as using the browser or any of my other tools.

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:19:43.409Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
Hi bob
</message>
Hi Firipu! How can I help you today?

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:24:03.589Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
Hello
</message>
Hello! Is there anything I can do for you?

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:26:22.736Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
Hi
</message>
Hi Firipu! Do you have any tasks for me, or questions I can answer?

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:26:43.297Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
/reset
</message>
Okay, I will reset my state. I will now forget our previous conversation.

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:26:56.855Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
/clear
</message>
I cannot clear the chat history. I can only reset my own memory. Is there anything else I can do for you?

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:27:10.137Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
hi
</message>
Hi Firipu! How can I help you today?

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:40:06.377Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
Hi bob
</message>
Hi Firipu! What can I do for you?

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:40:30.032Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
Can you try to go to mmo-champion and get me the latest news?
</message>
Okay, I will try to go to mmo-champion and get you the latest news. I will use the browser to do this.

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:41:21.377Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
Can you now try to access mmo-champion with the browser?
</message>
I am already trying to access mmo-champion with the browser. I'm waiting for the browser to return the page content.

<message from="Firipu" timestamp="2026-02-04T14:42:05.016Z" channel="1468469238787211325">
can you try with use_browser?
</message>
Yes, I am using `use_browser`. I need to wait for the browser to finish loading the page and return the content.
It seems like the browser command failed. I will try using web_fetch instead.

Midnight Beta Development Notes - February 3, 2026 










by 

Lumy 





View Profile







View Forum Posts








Private Message








View Started Threads





















Published on 2026-02-04 12:34 AM





















Midnight Beta Development Notes - February 3, 2026







Originally Posted by Blizzard 
( Blue Tracker / Official Forums )


The 12.0.1 Beta will be updated with an additional round of class tuning hotfixes later today. Here are the changes:



Classes



Death Knight

Hero Talents

Deathbringer

Frost

Exterminate first scythe damage increased by 30%.
Reaper’s Mark damage increased by 25%.
Deathly Blows now increases the damage of Frost Strike by 15% (was 5%).
Swift and Painful now grants 8% increased Strength when no enemies are struck by Soul Rupture (was 5%).

Rider of the Apocalypse

Auto-attack damage of all Horsemen is reduced by 50%.
Hungering Thirst now increases the damage of diseases, Frost Strike, Frostbane, and Death Coil by 5%, and now also affects Necrotic Coil.
Frost

Feast of Souls now increases the damage of Runic Power abilities by 10% when you have 2 or more active Horsemen (was 20%).

Unholy

Whitemane’s Epidemic damage increased 150%.
Trollbane’s Icy Fury damage increased by 100%.
Undeath damage increased by 50%.

San’layn

Unholy

Inevitable now increases the damage of diseases by up to 30% (was 20%).
Infliction of Sorrow now causes Vampiric Strike to extend the duration of plagues by 3 seconds (was 2 seconds).

Blood

Death Strike damage increased by 20%.
Blood Boil damage increased by 15%.
Heart Strike damage increased by 20%.
Death and Decay damage increased by 25%.
Consumption damage increased by 30%.
Bone Shield Armor increased by 20%.
Blood Fortification Stamina increased to 35% (was 30%).
Apex Talent: Dance of Midnight (Rank 1) now has 100% chance to trigger.

Frost

Obliterate damage increased by 15%.
Frost Strike damage reduced by 10%.
Frostbane damage reduced by 10%.

Unholy

All damage increased by 8%.

Demon Hunter

Hero Talents

Aldrachi Reaver

Reaver’s Glaive damage reduced by 10%.
Reaver’s Mark now increases damage taken by 5% per stack (was 6%).

Void-Scarred

Devourer

Developers’ notes: We’re taking some power out of Void-Scarred’s Metamorphosis window and shifting it to their non-Metamorphosis effects.
Flamebound has been updated – Hungering Slash critical strike damage bonus increased to 125% (was 50%). This does not affect PvP combat.
The damage bonus of Metamorphosis-empowered versions of Voidblade, Hungering Slash, and The Hunt reduced to 20% (was 30%).
Monster Rising now grants 15% increased Intellect when outside of Metamorphosis (was 8%).
Enduring Torment now increases the effectiveness of Mastery outside of Metamorphosis by 20% (was 10%).

Devourer

Reap damage increased by 75%.
Consume damage increased by 30% and now generates 1 additional Soul Fragment.
Shattered Souls now has a 4% chance to cause a damaging spell to generate a Soul Fragment (was 8%).
Entropy now grants you a Soul Fragment every 12 seconds while in combat (was 8 seconds).
Waste Not now causes Void Ray to have a 200% increased chance of generating a Soul Fragment (was 100%).
Fixed an issue causing male Devourer Demon Hunters to sometimes have a female voice during Void Metamorphosis.

Druid

Hero Talents

Keeper of the Grove

Balance

Spirit of the Thicket now increases Starfall damage by 12% (was 8%).

Restoration

Potent Enchantments increases Incarnation’s duration by 6 seconds (was 3 seconds).

Class

Matted Fur absorption increased by 100%.
Matted Fur lasts 15 seconds (was 8 seconds).
Regrowth direct healing reduced by 15%.
Wild Growth healing increased by 25%.

Balance

Starfire now deals 70% of primary target damage to nearby enemies (was 50%).
Starfall damage increased by 10%.
Starsurge damage increased by 5%.
Sunseeker Mushroom and Wild Mushroom damage increased by 10%.
Power of Goldrinn damage increased by 5%.
Denizen of the Dream damage reduced by 15%.

Developers’ notes: We’re rolling back some of the previous bonus to Denizen to move that damage into your own abilities instead.

Stellar Amplification increases your periodic effect damage on affected targets by 16% (was 20%).

Guardian

Armor granted by Ironfur increased by 10%.
Mangle damage increased by 30%.
Lunar Beam damage increased by 30%.
Moonfire damage increased by 30%.
Red Moon damage increased by 30%.
Innate Resolve now increases Frenzied Regeneration’s healing by up to 80% (was 120%).
Frenzied Regeneration now heals for 32% of maximum health over its duration (was 40%).
Frenzied Regeneration’s cooldown reduced to 26 seconds (was 36 seconds).
Ursoc’s Fury now grants an absorb shield for 30% of damage dealt by Thrash and Maul (was 40%).
Moonless Night increased to 40% (was 20%).
Killing Blow causes Maul and Raze to deal up to 100% increased damage (was 75%).

Restoration

Developers’ notes: The goal of these changes is to reduce Restoration Druid’s power in dungeons while keeping them at a similar power level in raids. This is primarily accomplished through reducing the effectiveness of their Mastery and Regrowth, while bringing up the effectiveness of Wild Growth and some raid-oriented talents. We’re also doing some targeted buffs for some weaker, unpopular talents for Restoration.
Mastery: Harmony effectiveness reduced by 20%.
Intensity increases Regrowth critical healing by 60% (was 75%).
Unstoppable Growth reduces Wild Growth’s fall off by 30% per point (was 15%).
Improved Wild Growth increases the number of Wild Growth targets by 2 (was 1).
Regenesis increases healing done by Rejuvenation or Tranquility by up to 30% per point (was 15%).
Embrace of the Dream healing increased by 85%.
Master Shapeshifter generates 20% more mana from Wrath, Starfire, and Starsurge.
Nurturing Dormancy increases Rejuvenations duration by up to 6 seconds (was 4 seconds).

Evoker

Hero Talents

Flameshaper

Devastation

Consume Flame now consumed 4 seconds of Fire Breath from Pyre (was 8 seconds) and 1 second of Fire Breath from Disintegrate damage (was 1.5 seconds).
Consume Flame damage is now dealt at 115% effectiveness (was 125%).

Devastation

Disintegrate damage increased by 10%.

Hunter

Developers’ notes: Beast Mastery is continuing to overperform across all content, so we’re bringing down their baseline power and apex talent damage and making smaller adjustments to individual hero talent trees.

Marksmanship is getting a small bump in AOE paired with a few buffs to underperforming spells like Kill Shot and Volley.

For Survival, we’re buffing up Wildfire Bomb’s single target damage bonus to ensure it isn’t being forgotten about in Pack Leader’s single target rotation and tamping down Sentinel since its already overperforming and poised to gain a significant boost from the Wildfire Bomb single target damage bonus.
Hero Talents

Dark Ranger

Beast Mastery

Shadow Thrash now deals Shadow damage, but its damage has been reduced by 30%.
Blighted Quiver now increases Beast Cleave and Kill Cleave effectiveness by 5% (was 10%).

Marksmanship

Pact of the Hollow now increases Blighted Arrow damage by 25%.

Pack Leader

Beast Mastery

Boar area damage increased by 200%.
Pack Mentality now grants 4 seconds of cooldown reduction to Barbed Shot (was 6 seconds) and increases Kill Command’s damage by 25% (was 50%).

Survival

No Mercy bleed bonus increased to 35% (was 20%).
Boar area damage increased by 200%.

Sentinel

Survival

Sentinel’s Mark has been updated – Wildfire Bomb damage bonus reduced to 40% (was 80%).
Can’t Miss, Won’t Miss has been updated – Tip of the Spear damage bonus reduced to 4% (was 10%).
Moon’s Blessing now grants 4 seconds of Wildfire Bomb cooldown reduction (was 6 seconds).

Beast Mastery

All damage dealt by the hunter and their pets reduced by 12%.
Apex Talent: Nature’s Ally now increases the damage of Cobra Shot and Barbed Shot by 15% (was 30%).

Marksmanship

Volley damage increased by 25%.
Trick Shots effectiveness increased to 75% (was 65%).
Aspect of the Hydra effectiveness increased to 70% (was 60%).
Kill Shot damage increased by 25% (does not affect Black Arrow).
Headshot now increases damage per stack by 3% (was 2%).

Survival

Wildfire Bomb primary target damage bonus increased to 60% (was 40%).
Two Against Many damage bonus reduced to 10% (was 15%).

Mage

Hero Talents

Frostfire

Fire

Heat Sink now increases Fire Blast damage by 15% (was 30%).
Dualcasting Adept now increases Pyroblast damage by 15% (was 10%).

Frost

Frostfire Bolt damage reduced by 20%.
Isothermic Core’s Meteor now Shatters 1 Freezing stack (was 2).
Duality’s Pyroblast damage increased by 100%.
Molten Chill Ignite effectiveness increased to 30% (was 15%).

Spellslinger

Arcane

Controlled Instincts has been updated – Cleave percentage increased to 60% (was 40%).
Arcane Splinter damage increased by 80%.
Signature Spell now increases Arcane Pulse and Arcane Blast damage by 25% (was 15%).
Polished Focus now increases Arcane Barrage damage by 25% (was 15%).

Frost

Controlled Instincts damage effectiveness increased to 60% (was 40%).

Sunfury

Arcane Phoenix area spell damage increased by 50%.
Arcane

Arcane Soul duration reduced to 4 seconds (was 6 seconds).
Ashes of Inspiration Haste reduced to 15% (was 20%) and duration reduced to 6 seconds (was 10 seconds).
Sunfury Execution now grants Arcane Barrage 5% increased damage during Touch of the Magi (was 10%).
Glorious Incandescence now summons a Meteor for every 6 stacks of Arcane Salvo consumed (was 5).

Fire

Spellfire Sphere chance to trigger increased to 25% (was 20%).
Burden of Power now increases Flamestrike and Pyroblast damage by 5% (was 8%).
Hyperthermia duration reduced to 4 seconds (was 6 seconds).
Ashes of Inspiration Haste reduced to 15% (was 20%) and duration reduced to 6 seconds (was 10 seconds).

Arcane

Developers’ notes: We’re looking to reduce Sunfury Arcane’s single target output significantly, but don’t want to sacrifice too much of what makes the Hero Talent tree exciting, so we’re opting to reduce Arcane’s baseline power while compensating Spellslinger. We’re also giving Arcane’s area damage some help, since they’ve been struggling in dungeon content.
Arcane Barrage damage reduced by 20%.
Arcane Missiles damage reduced by 20%.
Arcane Blast damage reduced by 20%.
Arcane Explosion damage reduced by 20%.
Arcane Orb damage increased by 60%.
Arcane Pulse damage increased by 10%.
Arcane Surge damage increased by 25%.
Arcing Cleave effectiveness increased to 60% (was 50%).
Resonance now increases Arcane Barrage’s damage by 8% for each target beyond the first (was 5%).
Touch of the Archmage has been updated – Damage taken during Touch of the Magi reduced to 15% (was 20%). Rune primary target damage bonus reduced to 75% (was 100%).

Fire

Developers’ notes: We’re taking some damage out of Fire Blast and Fireball and moving it into Pyroblast to ensure your Hot Streaks are hitting as hard as they should.
Mastery: Ignite effectiveness increased by 15%.
Pyroblast damage increased by 15%.
Fire Blast damage reduced by 40%.
Scald now increases Fireball’s damage by 25% (was 50%).

Frost

Developers’ notes: We’re looking to reduce Frost’s area damage while increasing their single target damage.
All damage dealt increased by 5%.
Shatter primary target damage increased by 40%.
Flurry damage reduced by 20%.
Glacial Assault chance to trigger reduced to 12% (was 25%).
Splitting Ice now causes Flurry and Frostbolt to strike an additional target at 80% effectiveness (was 100%).
Frozen Orb damage reduced by 20%.
Comet Storm now Shatters 1 Freezing stack per Missile (was 2).

Monk

Hero Talents

Master of Harmony

Brewmaster

Meditative Focus now increases Blackout Combo’s increase to Tiger Palm by an additional 100% (was 50%) and increases Press the Advantage’s Nature damage by an additional 100% (was 50%).
Way of a Thousand Strikes increases vitality stored by 60% (was 30%) and Path of Resurgence increases vitality stored by 50% (was 25%).
Aspect of Harmony now generates vitality based on 25% of damage dealt and 12% of effective healing (was 15% and 7%, respectively).

Brewmaster

Keg Smash damage increased by 40%.
Tiger Palm damage increased by 20%.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 20%.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 20%.

Mistweaver

Jadefire Teachings now increases Ancient Teachings by 260% (was 180%).
Way of the Crane now transfers 160% of damage done (was 120%).

Paladin

Hero Talents

Herald of the Sun

Retribution

Dawnlight damage increased by 120%.
Dawnlight radiates 5% of the its damage and healing to nearby allies or enemies (was 8%).
Fixed an issue causing Sun’s Avatar damage effect to occur every 0.5 seconds instead of every 1 second.

Templar

Protection

Hammer of Light damage increased by 100%.
Empyrean Hammer damage increased by 50%.

Retribution

Hammer of Light primary target damage increased by 30%. This change does not affect PvP combat.
Undisputed Ruling now lasts for 10 seconds (was 8 seconds).
Seal of the Templar now increases the damage of Templar’s Verdict by 25% (was 15%).

Holy

Developers’ notes: These changes were posted last week, but we’re including them again for posterity.
Flash of Light healing increased by 35%.
Shield of the Righteous now grants 140% more Mana.
Holy Shock mana cost reduced by 20%.
Holy Shock healing increased by 15%.
Shield of the Righteous damage increased by 100%.
Shining Righteousness damage increased by 100%.

Protection

Apex Talent: Glory of the Vanguard (Rank 4) now increases Shield of the Righteous’ damage to its initial target by 50% (was 20%) .
Armor granted by Shield of the Righteous reduced by 15%.

Priest

Hero Talents

Archon

Shadow

Halo damage increased by 50%.

Oracle

Discipline

Prompt Prognosis increases Penance’s first bolt by 125% (was 200%).
Prophet’s Insight increases Atonement healing from Holy spells by 15% (was 20%).

Voidweaver

Discipline

Collapsing Void damage increased by 33%.
Entropic Rift damage increased by 60%.

Shadow

Quickened Pulse now causes Shadow Word: Pain and Entropic Rift to deal damage 15% more often (was 25%).

Discipline

Shadow Mend healing increased by 19%.
Shadow Word: Death damage increased by 25%.
Shadow Word: Death deals 250% increased damage in execute range for Discipline (was 150%).

Holy

All healing done increased by 8%.

Shadow

All damage reduced by 15%.
Mind Blast damage increased by 40%. This also applies to Void Blast.
Shadow Word: Pain damage increased by 25%.
Vampiric Touch damage increased by 100%.
Psychic Link now transfers 60% of damage dealt to targets afflicted by Vampiric Touch (was 45%).
Spectral Horrors now causes Shadowy Apparitions to deal 50% increased damage to targets afflicted by Shadow Word: Madness (was 100%).

Rogue

Hero Talents

Deathstalker

Subtlety

Momentum of Despair effect now increases Shuriken Storm and Black Powder critical strike damage by 30% (was 20%).
Follow the Blood now increases Shuriken Storm and Black Powder damage by 15% (was 10%).
Mass Casualty now deals 75% of Deathstalker’s Mark (was 60%).

Fatebound

Ravenholdt Mint increases Tails’ damage bonus by 12% (was 15%).
Lucky Coin duration reduced to 12 seconds (was 15 seconds).

Assassination

All damage increased by 3%.
Melee damage increased by 10%.
Physical damage dealt by Implacable Strikes increased by 50%.
Doomblade bleed damage increased to 25% of Mutilate damage (was 20%).
Systemic Failure increases the damage dealt by Mutilate and Ambush to targets with Garrote by 30% (was 20%).

Outlaw

All damage increased by 15%.

Developers’ notes: Outlaw’s performance on the beta had been hampered by a significant bug. Now that it’s fixed, this damage bonus was not needed to keep them competitive. We are also adjusting Blade Flurry to keep AOE damage as intended in light of these changes.

Melee damage reduced by 10%.
Blade Flurry causes your abilities to strike nearby enemies for 30% of damage dealt (was 25%).

Subtlety

All damage reduced by 8%.

Shaman

Elemental

All damage reduced by 5%.
Lightning Bolt damage reduced by 10%.

Warlock

Hero Talents

Diabolist

Infernal Bolt damage increased by 150%.
Ruination damage increased by 50%. This change does not affect PvP combat.

Soul Harvester

Shared Vessel now increases Mastery by 2% (was 4%).
Manifested Demonic Soul’s Soul Swipe damage reduced by 30%. This change does not affect PvP combat.
Soul Anathema damage reduced by 40%.
Demonology

Demonic Soul damage reduced by 3%.

Affliction

Apex Talent: Shadow of Nathreza (Rank 3) now summons a Desperate Soul 100% more often.
Desperate Soul’s Wrath of Nathreza damage reduced by 50%.
Dark Harvest damage reduced by 30%.

Destruction

Incinerate damage increased by 50%.
Conflagrate damage increased by 40%. This change does not affect PvP combat.
Chaos Bolt damage increased by 10%. This change does not affect PvP combat.
Summon Overfiend damage increased by 50%.
Soul Fire damage increased by 40%.

Warrior

Hero Talents

Colossus

Arms

Practices Strikes damage bonus increased to 20% (was 15%).
Arterial Bleed damage bonus reduced to 3% per stack (was 5%).

Protection

Practiced Strikes damage bonus increased to 15% (was 10%).

Mountain Thane

Fury

Thunder Blast damage reduced by 30%.
Lightning Strike damage increased by 100%.

Protection

Ground Current damage increased by 150%.
Lightning Strike damage increased by 50%.
Thunder Blast damage reduced by 30%.

Slayer

Arms

Culling Cyclone bonus damage increased to 20% (was 10%).
Slayer’s Malice bonus damage reduced to 15% (was 20%).
Reap the Storm’s chance to trigger reduced to 20% (was 15%).

Fury

Culling Cyclone bonus damage increased to 20% (was 10%).
Slayer’s Malice bonus damage reduced to 15% (was 20%).

Class

Deep Wounds damage reduced by 30%.

Arms

Dreadnaught damage reduced by 50%.
Cleave damage increased by 20%.
Bladestorm damage increased by 30%.
Mortal Strike damage reduced by 20%.
Execute damage reduced by 20%.

Fury

Auto-attack damage reduced by 30%.
Bloodthirst damage increased by 10%.
Bladestorm damage increased by 30%.
Raging Blow damage reduced by 20%.

Protection

Shield Slam damage reduced by 20%.
Execute damage reduced by 20%.
Ignore Pain damage prevented per use increased by 5%.
Fueled by Violence healing increased to 110% of Rend and Deep Wounds damage dealt (was 85%).
Indomitable increases max health by 10% (was 6%) and heals 1% of your health for each 15 Rage spent (was 20 Rage).


Player Versus Player



Hunter

Hero Talents

Pack Leader

Boar damage reduced by 50% in PvP combat.

Mage

Arcane

Nether Flux (PvP Talent) has been removed.

Rogue

Subtlety

Secret Technique’s Shadow Clone strikes now correctly have damage reduced by 23% in PvP combat, matching the reduction applied to the initial strike.

WoW Midnight Presents: Northrend Live at Illuminarium Toronto February 21 










by 

Lumy 





View Profile







View Forum Posts








Private Message








View Started Threads





















Published on 2026-02-03 11:07 PM





















WoW Midnight Presents: Northrend Live at Illuminarium Toronto February 21







Originally Posted by Blizzard 
( Blue Tracker / Official Forums )


Canadian adventurers, it's time to gather and celebrate the launch of World of Warcraft®: Midnight™!



Mark your calendars for an epic community event. Attendance is free, and the event will stream live for those who cannot attend in person. Northrend Live gathers creators, players, and fans from coast-to-coast-to-coast for one immersive, high-energy experience, both in person and online.



When : Saturday, February 21, 2026, from 11:00 am to 6:00 pm EST

Where : Illuminarium Toronto, 28 Gristmill Lane, Toronto, ON M5A 4R2 (must be age 19 or older for entry)

Livestream : Twitch.tv/warcraft & Twitch.tv/Plkatv

Tickets Available : Thursday, February 5, at 3 pm EST



For all those attending Northrend Live in person, both VIP and General Admission ticket holders can:



Get face-to-face with creators and streamers.
Enter through the Void for an immersive light projection experience.
Chance to attend a meet-and-greet with WoW Design Lead Toby Ragaini (exact timeslot to be announced).
Create new and lasting memories in our Housing photobooth.
Take photos with and meet amazing WoW cosplayers.
Compete and win prizes in our own Darkmoon Faire (while supplies last).


In-Person Attendance



Tickets to Northrend Live are free and available on a first-come, first-served basis while supplies last.



To ensure as many in-person adventurers as possible can experience Northrend Live, two types of tickets will be available.



Free VIP Admission



A limited number of ticket holders will receive full-day access to Illuminarium Toronto from 11 am– 6 pm EST, a free swag bag (while supplies last), and the ability to watch the entire stream from start to finish (entry and exit allowed).



Free General Admission



If you didn't score VIP tickets, general admission is time-slotted. Three time-slot windows will be available to book tickets for Northrend Live.



If you miss out on grabbing a ticket in advance, you can still visit Northrend Live in person on the day of the event. We'll be welcoming adventurers to queue up for the event throughout the day, as venue capacity allows.



Grab Your Tickets




Livestream Details



For those who cannot attend in person, Northrend Live will livestream an action-packed program from 12 pm to 5 pm EST on Twitch.tv/warcraft and Twitch.tv/Plkatv , featuring professional hosts, casters, and creators from across the country:



"Weekly No Leaver" Live Podcast (hosted by Cartridgebros)
"Decor Gala" by Raider.io Competition Finals
"Creator" Jump Puzzle Competition
Faction Feud Live Game Show


Those watching from home can also tune in for fun giveaways!





Don't miss out on the chance to celebrate the launch of World of Warcraft Midnight with hundreds of fellow adventurers.

Published on 2026-02-03 09:07 PM





















WoW Hotfixes - February 3, 2026







Originally Posted by Blizzard 
( Blue Tracker / Official Forums )


Classes

Evoker

Devastation

Fixed an issue allowing Deep Breath to sometimes be castable more often than intended.


Housing

Fixed several decor items that were incorrectly priced. Their costs have been updated to the intended values.


Items

Fixed an issue where Mysterious Satchels could activate group loot rolls for players who were not in a group.


Player versus Player

Demon Hunter

Fel-Scarred: Focused Hatred now increases Demonsurge damage by 10% (was 50%) when damaging a single target, reducing by 2% (was 10%) per additional target in PvP combat.
Fel-Scarred: Demonsurge damage reduced by 20% in PvP combat.
Devourer
Developers’ notes: We’re applying several changes that were made to Devourer in the Beta, to reduce burst during pre-patch. These come along with an overall damage reduction to the specialization.

All damage reduced by 8% in PvP combat.
Consume damage increased by 100% in PvP combat. Does not affect Devour.
Devour damage increased by 30% in PvP combat.
Voidblade damage increased by 15% in PvP combat. Does not affect Pierce the Veil.
Void Ray damage increased by 30% in PvP combat.
Hungering Slash damage increased by 15% in PvP combat. Does not affect Reaper’s Toll.
Impending Apocalypse now increases the damage of your next Collapsing Star by 15% in PvP combat (was 30%).
Focused Ray now increases the damage of Void Ray by 15% in PvP combat (was 50%).
Inevitable End now reduces the cast time of Collapsing Star by 25% instead of increasing its damage done. Please note that the tooltip will not reflect this change during pre-patch.
Predator’s Wake damage reduced by 15% in PvP combat. This is the empowered The Hunt from Demonic Intensity.
Devourer’s Bite now increases the damage your target takes by 5% per application (was 12%).
Surrender to the Void now increases damage dealt while in Void Metamorphosis by 10% (was 20%).

Hunter

Pack Leader: Boar Charge damage is now reduced by 50% in PvP combat.


Quests

Doomshadow should live a little longer before meeting their demise for players who are participating in “The Big Dig”.


Twilight Ascension Event

Spawns in the Twilight Highlands should properly announce their presence to the zone when they spawn.
Fixed an issue preventing Eoin Dunwald from appearing during the Twilight Ascension event.
The weekly repeatable quests "Twilight's Dawn" and "Disrupt the Call" may now be completed per-character and they now award Twilight's Blade Insignias to all characters.
Twilight Ascension World Quests now award both Twilight's Blade Insignias and Resonance Crystals to all characters as their primary reward instead of awarding one or the other.


The Burning Crusade Classic

Player-characters who were incorrectly granted the 150 Epic riding skill have been reverted to riding skill 75.


Mists of Pandaria Classic

Developers’ notes: With today’s weekly maintenance, we’re removing some temporary power increases that were made to specs at the beginning of MoP Classic. This is a necessary step before we move to the next MoP patch, “Escalation”. These changes only affect servers where the Throne of Thunder is active, and do not impact PvP.
Classes

Mage

Fire

Combustion now provides an additional 20% of Ignite damage on the target (was 50%).

Warlock

Affliction

Reverted the 10% increase to Malefic Grasp’s DoT.
Reverted the 15% increase to Malefic Grasp’s damage.
Reverted the 20% incrase to Drain Soul’s DoT.
Reverted the 20% increase to Drain Soul’s DoT.

Demonology

Reverted the 25% increase to Doom.
Reverted the 10% increase to Soul Fire.

Hunter

Ranged attack power from the Legendary Meta Gem Capacitive Primal Diamond increased by 100%.
Developers’ notes: This adjustment is a separate tuning effort that applies to all Hunter specs.

Devourer Demon Hunter Tuning Incoming with the Weekly Maintenance







Originally Posted by Blizzard 
( Blue Tracker / Official Forums )


With scheduled weekly maintenance in each region, we’re doing some PvP tuning which will focus primarily on the Devourer Demon Hunter.



Player versus Player



Demon Hunter

Developers’ notes: We’re applying several changes that were made to Devourer in the Beta, to reduce burst during pre-patch. These come along with an overall damage reduction to the specialization.

Fel-Scarred: Focused Hatred now increases Demonsurge damage by 10% (was 50%) when damaging a single target, reducing by 2% (was 10%) per additional target in PvP combat.
Fel-Scarred: Demonsurge damage reduced by 20% in PvP combat.

Devourer

All damage reduced by 8% in PvP combat.
Consume damage increased by 100% in PvP combat. Does not affect Devour.
Devour damage increased by 30% in PvP combat.
Voidblade damage increased by 15% in PvP combat. Does not affect Pierce the Veil.
Void Ray damage increased by 30% in PvP combat.
Hungering Slash damage increased by 15% in PvP combat. Does not affect Reaper’s Toll.
Impending Apocalypse now increases the damage of your next Collapsing Star by 15% in PvP combat (was 30%).
Focused Ray now increases the damage of Void Ray by 15% in PvP combat (was 50%).
Inevitable End now reduces the cast time of Collapsing Star by 25% instead of increasing its damage done. Please note that the tooltip will not reflect this change during pre-patch.
Predator’s Wake damage reduced by 15% in PvP combat. This is the empowered The Hunt from Demonic Intensity.
Devourer’s Bite now increases the damage your target takes by 5% per application (was 12%).
Surrender to the Void now increases damage dealt while in Void Metamorphosis by 10% (was 20%).


Hunter

Pack Leader: Boar Charge damage is now reduced by 50% in PvP combat.








World of Warcraft Extended Maintenance - February 3, 2026

Blizzard has announced an extended maintenance for all World of Warcraft versions in North America, lasting approximately 4 hours from 7:00 AM PST until 11:00 AM PST. European realms will also have a 4-hour maintenance on Wednesday, from 3:00 AM CET until 7:00 AM CET.
